Installation

  • « Documentation
  • Getting Started »

Installation¶

Install Hyperkite on your system is very easy and can be done using a single terminal command on many operating systems. To make sure that all prerequisties (such as Python) are install correctly, we recommend you to first install Anaconda.

Pip Install¶

Install the Hyperkite package by running the following command in your terminal:

pip install hyperkite

You should be good to go!

Git Install¶

The package can also be installed manually, by first cloning the Git repository and installing from there:

git clone git+https://github.com/hyperkite/hyperkite.git
cd hyperkite
python setup.py .
